SummaryEnglish: At heart, Yuu Yuutani is a total goody-two-shoes and only has eyes for the school's Madonna, Atori Mizutori. To get the attention of Atori, Yuu gives up the honor roll to become a bad girl! Too bad this very good girl isn't very good at being bad!

1.TitleEnglish: As of Today, I'm a Bad Girl! / I Wanna Be a Bad Girl! / Dog Ears and a Collar
1.SummaryEnglish: Yuu Yuutani is a model first year student. However, to get the attention of her crush Atori Mizutori, Yuu decides to reinvent herself as the baddest of all delinquents!

2.TitleEnglish: Natural-Born Ero-ist / Secret Club / Please Tell Me!
2.SummaryEnglish: Yuu plots to use her delinquent charisma to impress Atori by on a Student Council visit to a kindergarten.

3.TitleEnglish: I Hate You / Is Ruu Cute? / First Kiss
3.SummaryEnglish: Mistaking Yuu for one of her fans, school idol Rura offers to shake her hand. But Yuu is so preoccupied with thoughts of Atori that she won't even admit that Rura is cute.

4.TitleEnglish: ADC Committee Assemble! / The Secret Classroom / A Rendez-vous with Rura Ruriha
4.SummaryEnglish: Yuu is once again stalking Atori. She finds what she believes is a holy revelation from Atori left on a whiteboard.

5.TitleEnglish: Shijimi and Hotate / Bool! / I've Got You Now!
5.SummaryEnglish: Head library assistant Kiyoraka, is a faultless honor student. However, she has an unexpected hidden side and takes an interest in Yuu.

6.TitleEnglish: Violent Times / Four-lling in Love / Heaven and Hell
6.SummaryEnglish: Yuu feels down about not being able to see Atori during Golden Week. She takes another blow when she hears that Atori is going to an amusement park with a special someone.

7.TitleEnglish: Clothes Change Chaos / The Enemy Is Within the Classroom / Welcome to Cafe Scramble!
7.SummaryEnglish: When Yuu stays after school to do some "birdwatching," or, taking secret candid photos of Atori, she encounters Mizuka!

8.TitleEnglish: A Co-Ord Based on Vibes / Confession / She's Here!
8.SummaryEnglish: Yuu comes up with a way to make Atori sign up for forest camp. Yuu soon finds herself in a tight spot on a different bus than Atori and Suzu.

9.TitleEnglish: Something Bad / Another Mountain / I'll Tempt You!
9.SummaryEnglish: It's time for forest camp, but Yuu finds herself left behind at the rest stop. But with Atori also left behind, the two try to come up with a plan.

10.TitleEnglish: In the Private Study Room / Gripping Rather Than Grabbing / In My Room
10.SummaryEnglish: The girls visit the library to study for a test. There's a sudden flash of lightning, and the school is enveloped in darkness due to a power outage.

11.TitleEnglish: A Really Fun Toy / Yuri-Track Camp / Wibutt
11.SummaryEnglish: While camping in the mountains, Rura hears a creepy noise. She finds that it is Yuu and Mizuka engaged in a mysterious activity.

12.TitleEnglish: Goodbye / I'll Give You All of Them! / The Ultimate Bad Girl
12.SummaryEnglish: Having grown with each passing day, Yuu's breathing has improved until she hears that Atori is going to study abroad in Chicago.
